attributes.action: Don't create a two tier society, enough of division, say no to Covid passports
attributes.additional_details: So we can start to heal the division in the country, take back our long standing liberties and move forward as on United Kingdom.
attributes.background: Stop terrorising and dividing people, say no to Covid passports, no to inequality in law, give us our liberty back and treat each and every one of us equally under the same law, no two tier society!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
